title: Mathematics-Themed Integrated Social Studies Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical competency and understanding of social studies fundamentals
context.additional_context: Mobile learning for current professionals, designing integrated math-social studies units with project-based assessment and BYOD environments.

learning_goals: Mathematical thinking and problem-solving strategies can be applied to resolve real-life issues within an integrated social studies context.
Learners can independently design and produce micro-content that integrates social studies themes with mathematical concepts.
Multidisciplinary approaches and assessment methods can be applied to practical settings through project-based learning.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
